backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, menu data, reservations, reviews, and access‑controlled admin operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend source files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining warm OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with all site pages, theme provider, and initial data seeding.
frontend/src/components/admin/MenuCatego: Admin UI for listing and adding menu categories through a form dialog and API hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/MenuItemMa: Admin interface to create, edit, and delete menu items with category selection and item details.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Wrapper that checks authentication, profile setup, and admin status before rendering admin content.
Modal image lightbox with keyboard navigation and previous/next controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal form that collects and saves a user's name, email, and phone number using a profile-save hook.
frontend/src/components/RatingStars.tsx: Displays a row of star icons representing a rating up to a configurable maximum.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, hours, and a credits section.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides the site header with logo, desktop navigation, and a mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps the page with a header, footer, and main content outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides React Query hooks for managing user profiles, admin checks, and CRUD operations on menu categories and items via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider enabling login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains read‑only React Query hooks for fetching menu categories, menu items, special items, and reviews from the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useReservations.ts: Defines a mutation hook to create reservations by converting date values and sending them to the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeedInitialData.ts: Runs initial seeding once when an actor and identity are available, calling the backend's seedInitialData method.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom color variables and global styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an informational page describing the restaurant's story, values, and highlights using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Displays the admin dashboard with tabs for managing menu items and categories, protected by an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information including address, phone, and opening hours using card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a grid of gallery images and opens a lightbox when an image is clicked.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, signature dishes loaded from queries, and featured reviews.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Shows menu categories in tabs and loads items per category with loading states and vegetarian indicators.
frontend/src/pages/ReservationPage.tsx: Provides a reservation form with validation, date/time inputs, and submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats a bigint price in paise into a rupee string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state and requirements for building a multi-page Indian restaurant website with images, features, and admin menu management. Includes feature definitions, image needs, and architectural notes.
